analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na niyatam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na abyākatam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ naaniyatañca naabyākataṁ naaniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato
analyzed: na kusalam na aniyatam ca na abyākatam na aniyatam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ naaniyatañca naabyākataṁ naaniyatañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na aniyatam ca na abyākatam na aniyatam ca dhamma

original: paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
analyzed: paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca
